DOC.detailed_description: This randomize clinical trial Philadelphia resident woman experience pre-term birth ( PTB ) < 34 week gestation ( GA ) 18 month period approach time postpartum hospital stay . Consenting woman randomize usual care group interconceptional intervention target five risk condition , increase systemic inflammation . Our primary objective study ass efficacy interconceptional intervention rate repeat PTB . Participants randomize one two group : usual care interconceptional intervention . Those randomized interconceptional intervention group target five risk condition , include smoking , depression , infectious disease burden maternal stress , achieve appropriate BMI . It hop reduce seemingly disparate yet well-known risk condition , reduce PTB subsequent race/ethnic disparity .
